00002 // File: VCollisionLayout.inl
00003 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00004 // Project: Endpoint Designer
00005 // Author: Joni-Matti M‰‰tt‰
00006 // Date: 22.4.2011
00007 //
00008 // Description:
00009 // Vertical collision-based layout.
00010 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00011 
00012 namespace VCollisionLayout
00013 {
00014     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00015     // Function: updateItemMove()
00016     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017     template <class T>
00018     void updateItemMove(QList<T*>& items, T* item, qreal minY, qreal spacing)
00019     {
00020         item->setY(std::max(minY - item->boundingRect().top(), item->y()));
00021 
00022         // Remove the moved item from the list.
00023         items.removeAt(items.indexOf(item));
00024 
00025         int index = 0;
00026         qreal y = minY;
00027 
00028         // Phase 1. Skip over the items that are fully above the moved item.
00029         for (index = 0; index < items.size(); ++index)
00030         {
00031             T* curItem = items.at(index);
00032 
00033             if (curItem->y() + curItem->boundingRect().bottom() + spacing >
00034                 item->y() + item->boundingRect().top())
00035             {
00036                 break;
00037             }
00038 
00039             y = curItem->y() + curItem->boundingRect().bottom() + spacing;
00040         }
00041 
00042         // Phase 2. Move the first colliding item above the moved item if it is possible
00043         // and the moved item is at least slightly over the colliding item.
00044         if (index < items.size())
00045         {
00046             T* curItem = items.at(index);
00047 
00048             if (item->y() < curItem->y() && curItem->y() + curItem->boundingRect().top() <
00049                 item->y() + item->boundingRect().bottom() + spacing &&
00050                 y + curItem->boundingRect().height() + spacing <= item->y() + item->boundingRect().top() &&
00051                 item->y() + item->boundingRect().top() - spacing - curItem->boundingRect().bottom() >= minY)
00052             {
00053                 curItem->setY(item->y() + item->boundingRect().top() - spacing -
00054                               curItem->boundingRect().bottom());
00055 
00056                 ++index;
00057             }
00058         }
00059 
00060         // Phase 3. Put the moved item to its correct place.
00061         items.insert(index, item);
00062 
00063         // Phase 4. Move the rest of the items below the moved item so that they do not collide.
00064         while (index < items.size() - 1)
00065         {
00066             T* item1 = items.at(index);
00067             T* item2 = items.at(index + 1);
00068 
00069             if (item1->y() + item1->boundingRect().bottom() + spacing >
00070                 item2->y() + item2->boundingRect().top())
00071             {
00072                 item2->setY(item1->y() + item1->boundingRect().bottom() + spacing -
00073                                 item2->boundingRect().top());
00074             }
00075 
00076             ++index;
00077         }
00078     }
00079 
00080     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081     // Function: setItemPos()
00082     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00083     template <class T>
00084     void setItemPos(QList<T*> const& /*items*/, T* item, qreal x, qreal /*minY*/, qreal /*spacing*/)
00085     {
00086         item->setX(x);
00087     }
00088 }
